blogPost.excerpt: Bird Buddy is a smart bird feeder that notifies you of feathered visitors, captures their photos and organizes them in a beautiful collection.
blogPost.body: Bird Buddy is a smart bird feeder that notifies you of feathered visitors, captures their photos and organizes them in a beautiful collection.
blogPost.title: Bird Buddy - A smart bird feeder that notifies you of feathered visitors
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Bird Buddy是一款智能的鸟类喂食器，它可以通知你有羽毛的访客，捕捉他们的照片，并将他们组织成一个美丽的集合。
localize.tagline: 一个智能的鸟类喂食器，它会通知你有羽毛的访客

localize.description: Bird Buddy是一款智能的鳥類餵食器，它可以通知你有羽毛的訪客，捕捉他們的照片，並將他們組織成一個美麗的集合。
localize.tagline: 一個智能的鳥類餵食器，它會通知你有羽毛的訪客

previous.excerpt: GlamAR is a virtual makeup try-on, designed for beauty and cosmetic brands. Integrate with your brand website or app to help customers try-on products live, directly from their mobile or laptop.
previous.title: GlamAR - Augmented Reality platform for a seamless try on experience

localize.description: Glamar是一种虚拟化妆试穿，专为美容和化妆品品牌设计。与您的品牌网站或应用程序集成，帮助客户直接从手机或笔记本电脑现场试用产品。
localize.tagline: 无缝体验体验的增强现实平台

localize.description: Glamar是一種虛擬化妝試穿，專爲美容和化妝品品牌設計。與您的品牌網站或應用程序集成，幫助客戶直接從手機或筆記本電腦現場試用產品。
localize.tagline: 無縫體驗體驗的增強現實平臺

next.excerpt: AmzChart is a free analytics tool to help scale your Amazon business. It can save your time to find lucrative niches and get insight into the most profitable niche markets on Amazon.
next.title: AmzChart - Powerful analysis tool to scale your Amazon business

localize.description: AmzChart是一款免费的分析工具，可帮助您扩展亚马逊业务。它可以节省您寻找有利可图的利基市场的时间，并洞察亚马逊上最有利可图的利基市场。
localize.tagline: 强大的分析工具，可扩展您的亚马逊业务

localize.description: AmzChart是一款免費的分析工具，可幫助您擴展亞馬遜業務。它可以節省您尋找有利可圖的利基市場的時間，並洞察亞馬遜上最有利可圖的利基市場。
localize.tagline: 強大的分析工具，可擴展您的亞馬遜業務
